original_title: 母と娘のレズビアン お母ちゃん、うちをレズ調教してくれへん！ 二ノ宮慶子 月代希
overview: Nozomi invited her to a hot spring trip as a gift for Mother's Day. Rarely, he had a motive and was planning to intimidate his mother, Keiko, to form a physical relationship. Keiko, who was pressed by her real daughter, resisted the wall of parents and children at first, but was eventually swallowed by the waves of pleasure.
title: Mother and Daughter Lesbians Mom Won't Train Me To Be A Lesbian! Keiko Ninomiya Nozomi Tsukishiro
